A bit about yourself

I am front-end developer with 1 year experience of web-development. Now I work as a freelance programmer. I'm creating websites for business and advertising.

My purpose is to create beautiful and convenient web sites for my clients. Contact me and I will do all needed to make your project look amazing

Resume

My skills

HTML 5 - HyperText Markup Language

A standard markup language for web pages on the Internet.I am working on W3C standards (valid code). Code is being tested on validator.w3.org.

CSS 3 - Cascading Style Sheets

Cascading style sheets. CSS is used for visual presentation of pages written in HTML.

Java Script

A programming language. Allows the user to interact with the browser. I'm engaged in writing simple scripts for pages using JS libraries.

J Queri

jQuery is the most popular javascript library that is used extensively today. JQuery is used by over half of the million most visited sites. Allows you to create animation for high-level effects. It facilitates the creation of dynamic web pages.

Responsive web design

I create pages that are correctly displayed on screens of different devices and dynamically adapt to the size of the browser window.

Bootstrap

Bootstrap is the most popular HTML, CSS, and JS framework for the appearance and interactivity of web pages.

SASS

Interpreted in Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) .Sass is designed to simplify writing CSS files.

Gulp

Gulp - task manager focused on frontend development.
